description:
Danny chats with RHONY's Jill Zarin and daughter Ally Shapiro about their charity efforts (Noshes for Nurses), #RHONY, Scary Island, and lots more!


WATCH the interview on YouTube at YouTube.com/DannyPellegrino1


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
